sentences.sContent: The harbour is an important naval base.
sentences.sContent_eng: The harbour is an important naval base.
sentences.sCn: 该港是一个重要的海军基地。

sentences.sContent: America lend-leased many naval crafts allied countries during the World War Ⅱ.
sentences.sContent_eng: America lend-leased many naval crafts allied countries during the World War Ⅱ.
sentences.sCn: 二战时，美国根据租借法案向盟国提供了许多海军舰只。
